entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight then 70 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
